grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 怒鳴り込む【ドナリコム】to storm in with a yell
怒鳴る【ドナル】to shout (in anger), to yell
喜怒【キド】joy and anger, human emotions
大激怒【ダイゲキド】getting extremely enraged, becoming furious
憤怒【フンヌ】anger, rage, resentment, indignation, exasperation
kun reading compounds: 怒る【おこる】to get angry, to get mad, to tell someone off, to scold, to be angular, to be square
怒る【おこる】to get angry, to get mad, to tell someone off, to scold, to be angular, to be square
